name: Deathless

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally RESIST in the Arena by 70.

skills.name: Grave Whispers
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 70% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns if 1 or more allies are dead, a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns if 2 or more allies are dead, and a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns if 3 or more allies are dead.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Vile Insults
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Grim Revenge
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. This attack will always be critical if there are 2 or more dead allies. Damage increases according to the number of dead allies.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
